Description: Tool for identification of eukaryotic sequences in the metagenomic datasets.
EDAM_operation: Genome comparison, Data retrieval, Variant calling, Genome visualisation, Structural variation detection
EDAM_operation_(no_superclasses): Genome comparison, Data retrieval, Variant calling, Genome visualisation, Structural variation detection
EDAM_topic: Sequencing, Genomics, DNA polymorphism, DNA structural variation
bio.tool_description: Total Integrated Archive of Short-Read and Array (TIARA) database, contains personal genomic information obtained from next generation sequencing (NGS) techniques and ultra-high-resolution comparative genomic hybridization (CGH) arrays. This database improves the accuracy of detecting personal genomic variations, such as SNPs, short indels and structural variants (SVs).
